Polluting Paradise (German: , nkè a makwaara dị ka Garbage in the Garden of Eden) bụ ihe nkiri German nke afọ 2012 nke Fatih Akın duziri
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na ngalaba Special Screenings na 2012 Cannes Film Festival. Ọ na-elekwasị ányà n'obodo nta Turkey nké Çamburnu na Sürmene, nkè gọọmentị mèrè ka ọ bụrụ ébé a na-ekpofu ihe.
